name: LEAFLINE LABS
sampleDescriptions: Federal prohibitions on financial institutions providing banking services to medical cannabis businesses.

Allowing legally authorized medical cannabis businesses deductibility of ordinary business expenses that are allowed to all other businesses, but presently prohibited by federal law.

HR1810- Small Bu
